DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the use of the Sirolimus-eluting Collagen Implant will improve AV Fistula outcomes, including time to first dialysis and suitability for dialysis at 6 months, in subjects undergoing surgical creation of an AV fistula for providing vascular access for hemodialysis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of the Sirolimus-Eluting Collagen Implant to Assess AV Fistula Outcomes in Patients on Hemodialysis
